body.name: ABOVE Shaving Foam Elements, Carbon Activated, 6.7 oz - Shaving Cream - With Activated Charcoal - Hydrates and Controls Oiliness - For All Skin Types
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 8 hrs 19 mins
features: With Activated Charcoal: Experience a deep cleanse that leaves your skin refreshed and ready for the perfect shave. Elevate your grooming routine with ABOVE Shaving Foam Elements.

Excess Oil Absorption: Conquer excess oil with ABOVE's Carbon Activated Shaving Cream. With a blend of powerful ingredients, achieve a shine-free complexion while enjoying a smooth, comfortable shave.
Soft and Light Touch: Indulge in a soft touch with this shaving cream. The luxuriously smooth texture glides effortlessly, delivering a comfortable, irritation-free shave.
Skin Hydration: Experience a moisturizing boost that leaves your skin nourished and revitalized. Quench your skin's thirst with every shave, making it an essential part of your routine.
Guilt-Free Confidence: This shaving cream is triclosan-free and benzene-free. Embrace a cruelty-free, vegan choice that keeps you fresh while caring for your skin and our planet.
body.description: Level up your shaving routine with ABOVE Shaving Foam Elements. This shaving cream transcends the ordinary, boasting the purifying prowess of activated charcoal. Picture your daily grooming routine transformed into a sensorial journey, where each stroke reveals a symphony of benefits. Unlock the secret to oil control as its formula, enriched with activated charcoal, effortlessly balances excess oil. It cleanses and revitalizes, leaving your skin impeccably refreshed. This shaving cream caresses your skin with a soft, velvety touch, making it not just a routine but a moment of indulgence. As you shave, this shaving cream hydrates, making your skin nourished and moisturized. Designed for versatility, our shaving foam caters to all skin types. Whether you have sensitive skin or not, indulge in the luxury of a skincare-infused grooming experience.This shaving cream is triclosan-free and benzene-free, offering a level of care that extends beyond the surface. This product is also vegan and cruelty-free, making it a sustainable choice. Experience a new level of freshness and performance with ABOVE Shaving Foam Elements.
